verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, “\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w going|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w Fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bethlehem, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w selected|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Myself.”

“\w How|strong="H8085"\w* \w can|strong="H3947"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*?” \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* asked. “\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*!” \w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* say, ‘\w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w invite|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w will|strong="H6213"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*. \w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w Me|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* indicate.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*. \w When|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w* \w met|strong="H7122"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w trembled|strong="H2729"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w come|strong="H7122"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*?”

“\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3068"\w* replied. “\w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H6942"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* come \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H7121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* arrived, \w Samuel|strong="H7200"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* Eliab \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w Surely|strong="H1961"\w* here \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w height|strong="H6967"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w outward|strong="H5869"\w* \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Abinadab \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w presented|strong="H5674"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* chosen \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w either|strong="H1571"\w*.”

Next \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w presented|strong="H5674"\w* \w Shammah|strong="H8048"\w*,\f + \fr 16:9 \ft Shammah is a variant of Shimeah, Shimea, and Shimei; see 2 Samuel 13:3, 1 Chronicles 2:13, and 2 Samuel 21:21.\f* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H5674"\w* said, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* chosen \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w either|strong="H1571"\w*.”

\w Thus|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w made|strong="H3448"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* told \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* chosen \w any|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H6440"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w asked|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Are|strong="H5288"\w* \w these|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H8552"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sons \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w*?” “\w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w*,” \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* replied, “\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w tending|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.” “\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*,” \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* replied. “\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sit|strong="H5437"\w* \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w eat|strong="H7462"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* arrives.”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* Jesse \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* youngest son \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w brought|strong="H5869"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* ruddy, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w handsome|strong="H3303"\w* \w appearance|strong="H5869"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w Rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w presence|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brothers, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w rushed|strong="H6743"\w* \w upon|strong="H4605"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w forward|strong="H4605"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*. David Serves Saul

After \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w distress|strong="H7451"\w* \f + \fr 16:14 \ft Or a harmful spirit; similarly in verses 15, 16, and 23\f* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* began \w to|strong="H3068"\w* torment \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* said \w to|strong="H5650"\w* him, “\w Surely|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w distress|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H7307"\w* God \w is|strong="H2009"\w* tormenting \w you|strong="H4994"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* lord \w command|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w here|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w out|strong="H1245"\w* someone \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* skillfully \w play|strong="H5059"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*. \w Whenever|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w distress|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w play|strong="H5059"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w well|strong="H2895"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* commanded \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, “\w Find|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* someone \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w plays|strong="H5059"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* bring \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H5650"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*.”

\w One|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bethlehem \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w play|strong="H5059"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* harp. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w valor|strong="H2428"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w warrior|strong="H1368"\w*, \w eloquent|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w handsome|strong="H8389"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w* loaded \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* skin \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w entered|strong="H5975"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w service|strong="H5975"\w*, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* admired \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* armor-bearer.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* word \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, saying, “\w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w remain|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w service|strong="H5975"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w pleased|strong="H5869"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w whenever|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w would|strong="H7307"\w* \w pick|strong="H3947"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w play|strong="H5059"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w would|strong="H7307"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w well|strong="H2895"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w distress|strong="H7451"\w* \w would|strong="H7307"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.
